verses.text_plain: And at that time shall Michael stand up, the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people: and there shall be a time of trouble, such as never was since there was a nation even to that same time: and at that time thy people shall be delivered, every one that shall be found written in the book.
verses.verse_html: 1And at that time shall Michael stand up, the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people: and there shall be a time of trouble, such as never was since there was a nation even to that same time: and at that time thy people shall be delivered, every one that shall be found written in the book.

tokens.text: such as never was since there was a nation
every one that shall be found

verses.text_plain: And many of them that sleep in the dust of the earth shall awake, some to everlasting life, and some to shame and everlasting contempt.
verses.verse_html: 2And many of them that sleep in the dust of the earth shall awake, some to everlasting life, and some to shame and everlasting contempt.

verses.text_plain: And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.
verses.verse_html:
3And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever. ▼
▼ wise: or, teachers

verses.text_plain: But thou, O Daniel, shut up the words, and seal the book, even to the time of the end: many shall run to and fro, and knowledge shall be increased.
verses.verse_html: 4But thou, O Daniel, shut up the words, and seal the book, even to the time of the end: many shall run to and fro, and knowledge shall be increased.

verses.text_plain: Then I Daniel looked, and, behold, there stood other two, the one on this side of the bank of the river, and the other on that side of the bank of the river.
verses.verse_html:
5Then I Daniel looked, and, behold, there stood other two, the one on this side of the bank of the river, and the other on that side of the bank of the river. ▼
▼ bank: Heb. lip
 , ▼
▼ bank: Heb. lip

tokens.text: on that side of the bank

verses.text_plain: And one said to the man clothed in linen, which was upon the waters of the river, How long shall it be to the end of these wonders?
verses.verse_html:
6And one said to the man clothed in linen, which was upon the waters of the river, How long shall it be to the end of these wonders? ▼
▼ upon…: or, from above

footnotes.body_html: ▼ upon…: or, from above

verses.text_plain: And I heard the man clothed in linen, which was upon the waters of the river, when he held up his right hand and his left hand unto heaven, and sware by him that liveth for ever that it shall be for a time, times, and an half; and when he shall have accomplished to scatter the power of the holy people, all these things shall be finished.
verses.verse_html:
7And I heard the man clothed in linen, which was upon the waters of the river, when he held up his right hand and his left hand unto heaven, and sware by him that liveth for ever that it shall be for a time, times, and an half; and when he shall have accomplished to scatter the power of the holy people, all these things shall be finished. ▼
▼ a time…: or, part

tokens.text: and when he shall have accomplished

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a time…: or, part

verses.text_plain: And I heard, but I understood not: then said I, O my Lord, what shall be the end of these things?
verses.verse_html: 8And I heard, but I understood not: then said I, O my Lord, what shall be the end of these things?

verses.text_plain: And he said, Go thy way, Daniel: for the words are closed up and sealed till the time of the end.
verses.verse_html: 9And he said, Go thy way, Daniel: for the words are closed up and sealed till the time of the end.

verses.text_plain: Many shall be purified, and made white, and tried; but the wicked shall do wickedly: and none of the wicked shall understand; but the wise shall understand.
verses.verse_html: 10Many shall be purified, and made white, and tried; but the wicked shall do wickedly: and none of the wicked shall understand; but the wise shall understand.

verses.text_plain: And from the time that the daily sacrifice shall be taken away, and the abomination that maketh desolate set up, there shall be a thousand two hundred and ninety days.
verses.verse_html:
11And from the time that the daily sacrifice shall be taken away, and the abomination that maketh desolate set up, there shall be a thousand two hundred and ninety days. ▼
▼ the abomination: Heb. to set up the abomination
 , ▼
▼ maketh…: or, astonisheth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the abomination: Heb. to set up the abomination
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the abomination: Heb. to set up the abomination

verses.text_plain: Blessed is he that waiteth, and cometh to the thousand three hundred and five and thirty days.
verses.verse_html: 12Blessed is he that waiteth, and cometh to the thousand three hundred and five and thirty days.

verses.text_plain: But go thou thy way till the end be: for thou shalt rest, and stand in thy lot at the end of the days.
verses.verse_html:
13But go thou thy way till the end be: for thou shalt rest, and stand in thy lot at the end of the days. ▼
▼ for thou: or, and thou, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for thou: or, and thou, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for thou: or, and thou, etc
